title: Police Don't Move! ... well sometimes we do
description: Ride along in the patrol car as we see hear and feel the reality of life on the streets as a police officer on the Gold Coast - Australia's glitter strip. Meet the mad, the bad ... and the sad, in all their glory. Be amazed at the rat like cunning, the guile - and of course the abject stupidity of offenders as they cross this talented author's path.
author: N.E. Wood
